summary:
We need to produce JSON with keys: summary, business_intent, keywords (list). Must not list method names verbatim. Focus on class responsibility and state/behavior. Provide English description.

Class DiffusionModelUNetMaisi: a U-Net architecture for latent diffusion models with timestep embedding, attention, conditioning, etc. So summary: a configurable U-Net for high-resolution image synthesis and brain imaging generation, supporting spatial dimensions, residual blocks, attention, conditioning via transformers, class embeddings, optional features like flash attention, dropout, region index inputs, spacing input, etc. Business intent: to serve as core neural network component in diffusion-based generative models for medical imaging and other high-res image synthesis tasks, enabling flexible conditioning and efficient attention. Keywords: U-Net, diffusion model, latent diffusion, attention, transformer, conditioning, timestep embedding, residual blocks, class-conditional, flash attention, medical imaging, high-resolution synthesis.

Make sure not to list method names verbatim. Provide JSON.

Summary: "A configurable U‑Net architecture designed for latent diffusion models, integrating timestep and optional class embeddings, multi‑scale residual blocks, attention mechanisms (including cross‑attention and optional flash attention), and optional conditioning inputs such as spatial transformers, region indices, and spacing information."

Business intent: "Provides the core generative backbone for high‑resolution image synthesis and brain imaging generation pipelines, allowing researchers and developers to build diffusion‑based models with flexible conditioning and efficient attention for medical and general imaging applications."

Keywords list: ["U-Net", "latent diffusion", "timestep embedding", "attention", "cross-attention", "flash attention", "residual blocks", "conditioning", "spatial transformer", "class‑conditional", "medical imaging", "high‑resolution synthesis"].
